member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Contracts_Accepted_Text
member.summary: By accepting this contract you are bound to fulfill all conditions of this contract in timely manner. Failing to do so may lead to negative feedback and loss of assets.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Contracts_Completed_Text
member.summary: Thanks for doing the job. Here is your reward: Reputation: {0} Payment: {1}

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Deliver_Description_0
member.summary: A priority package is to be delivered to a client of us and we are looking for the right person for the job. You will pay a mandatory collateral upon accepting this contract. Failing to complete the contract within the time limit will result our client being quite unpleased with our services and your collateral will be lost. We are sure you are up to the task.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Escort_Description_0
member.summary: One of our cargo ship operators reported potential threats and is unable to proceed. We are in need of a pilot with the right equipment to escort this cargo ship safely until the treat has subsided. You will be paid appropriately. Are you up for the job?

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Find_Description_0
member.summary: A container got lost during transit and a client of ours is eager to see it returned. Go to it's last known location and find this container.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Hunt_Description_0
member.summary: With the absence of organized law enforcement the responsibility falls to individual factions to make sure that criminals do not go unpunished. With that said, we have received reports of the location of one such culprit and we need you to make an example of them, so that others are not tempted down the same path. Find and take the target down. Use hand-held weapons or tools for the full reward. You will be kept up to date of the latest reported position of your target.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_ObtainDeliver_Description_0
member.summary: A client of ours has requested some specific goods they wish delivered to this station for pickup. Obtain the goods and then deliver them to us. We will ensure you are adequately rewarded.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.StoreBuy_Error_Text_NotEnoughAmount
member.summary: There is not enough amount of the item.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.StoreBuy_Error_Text_NotEnoughStoreBlockInventorySpace
member.summary: There is not enough space in the store block inventory to complete transaction.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Contracts_Error_Text_FinishCondition_NotEnoughSpace
member.summary: Contract could not be finished. There is not enough space for transfered items.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Deliver_Description_1
member.summary: A partnered station has not been able to supply one of its customers due to a shortage. They have requested that we will fill the gap and deliver the order as soon as possible. Accepting this contract will require collateral and said collateral will be forfeit if you fail to complete the assignment in time.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Deliver_Description_2
member.summary: We are looking for skilled couriers capable of handling jobs within a tight schedule. We require a mandatory collateral upon accepting this contract. You will be reimbursed and rewarded upon completing the contract but failing to do so will forfeit the collateral. Time is key, are you up for it?

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Escort_Description_1
member.summary: A nearby transport requested assistance after detecting hostile activity in it's vicinity. Go to the transport and make sure it gets through in one piece. Your feats will dictate your compensation.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Escort_Description_2
member.summary: It looks like one of our competitors decided to resort to less conventional ways to beat the competition. Report to our cargo ship and keep it safe. Let them know we mean business. You will be rewarded based on your performance.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Find_Description_1
member.summary: Due to a navigational error a cargo capsule was misdelivered and we only know it's rough whereabouts. We need someone capable of finding it before someone else does. Are you up for it?

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Find_Description_2
member.summary: We need someone to pick up a discreet package whose exact position is unknown. Locate this package for us and there will be a reward for you.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Hunt_Description_1
member.summary: It seems like someone has made a bit of a name for themselves at the expense of others and in doing so made some of our clients quite unhappy. We just received reports detailing this person's last known position. We will happily compensate you if you can track them down and take them out. To ensure proper identification of your target we would prefer you take them down with either weapons or hand tools, if you prefer. You will be more highly rewarded for doing so. We will make sure you are updated with the last known location of the target. Are you up to the job?

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Hunt_Description_2
member.summary: Someone has been causing a lot of trouble lately and we need someone who isn't afraid to deal with it. We will relay the target's last known position to you. Go there, find the troublemaker, and take them out. You will receive the full reward if the contract is completed by means of hand-held weaponry.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_ObtainDeliver_Description_1
member.summary: This station is in need of maintenance but we are in short supply. Get us the required materials and you will be paid in full.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_ObtainDeliver_Description_2
member.summary: As a result of a miscommunication with a distributor we find ourselves short on some supplies. Find us these supplies, bring them here and you will be compensated for your services.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ReputationBat_Tooltip_Friendly
member.summary: Friendly relation From {0} to {1} reputation. Able to interact. Bonus deals. {2}% discount (up to {4}%), {3}% sell bonus (up to {5}%).

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ReputationBat_Tooltip_Hostile
member.summary: Hostile relation From {0} to {1} reputation. Unable to interact, attacked on sight.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ReputationBat_Tooltip_Neutral
member.summary: Neutral relation From {0} to {1} reputation. Able to interact.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Escort_Description_3
member.summary: One of our transports is experiencing technical difficulties and some vultures seemed to have taken notice. Go out there and protect the transport. Make them think twice. You will be rewarded based on how well you performed.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_ObtainDeliver_Description_3
member.summary: Some of our stock has not been able to keep up with demand. Help us resupply and you will be paid a fair price.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_ObtainDeliver_Description_4
member.summary: We have several buyers interested in products not currently available to us. Help find these products and you will receive a sizeable cut.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_ObtainDeliver_Description_5
member.summary: These commodities have been in high demand lately and we are running low. Interested in helping out? You will be adequately compensated.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_0
member.summary: I happen to know a guy who knows a guy with some good deals. The real quality stuff you know? But it doesn't look like I will be getting anywhere near this place to profit from these deals so I will sell you the data if you are interested.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_1
member.summary: A friend of mine who works on a remote station called in saying he has some contracts ready. They pay a good amount so if you are looking for a job then that's the place to go. Good luck!

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_2
member.summary: So you are looking for more jobs or trade? Sure we can sort you out. Take a look at this place. It is a bit remote but rumor goes that pilots find good opportunities here.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_3
member.summary: Some conflict between two factions left a field of debris and salvager are plucking the fruits by selling their findings to a nearby station that now has their stocks overflowing. If you are looking for good deals or work then this is the place to go.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_4
member.summary: There is plenty of work available if you know where to look. You should investigate this place, I heard there is a shortage on couriers.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_5
member.summary: Some Merchant keeps bragging about some really good deals at a station he has been visiting but would not spill the details. However, I happened to "stumble" on his navigation computer during my maintenance shift and this position kept popping up. Go see if there is any truth in what that merchant said.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_6
member.summary: I used to visit this place at a regular basis during my engineering days and they always had some good deals available. Go see if they are still at it.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_7
member.summary: A station lost some its client's due to some conflict of interest between factions and is now looking for new hires. Interested? This is where you should go.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Datapad_Station_GPS_Content_8
member.summary: Looking for Reliable contracts? Good trades? Or just making good money? You are in luck! Opportunity awaits at these coordinates!

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.IngameHelp_Economy_GPSDesc
member.summary: This is location of the nearest trading station, where you can buy/sell various items.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ToolTipWorldSettingsBountyContracts
member.summary: Enables bounty contracts being available on stations.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.StoreBuy_Error_Text_NotEnoughPCU
member.summary: You don't have enough PCU to buy this item.

member.summary: You do not meet requirements to accept this contract. You are the target.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Contracts_AcceptConfirmation_Text
member.summary: By accepting this contract you are bound to fulfill all conditions of this contract in timely manner. Failing to do so may lead to negative feedback and loss of assets.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Text_NoActiveContracts
member.summary: You do not have any Contract active.

member.summary: Do you really want to abandon this contract?

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Contracts_AbandonConfirmation_Text
member.summary: By abandoning this contract you will lose all collateral you have paid and you may lose some reputation in process.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.GUI_Datapad_CreateGPSCoord_TTIP
member.summary: Press to create gps coordinate marker.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Economy_FactionIcon_Tooltip_BuyEconomy
member.summary: Buy Economy DLC to unlock these faction icons

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.IngameHelp_Datapad_Desc
member.summary: I can see you have a datapad in your inventory. Datapad can hold important information you wish to store there. For example, datapad bought on stations contain coordinates of other stations.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Repair_Description_0
member.summary: Our equipment has sustained serious damage as result of a recent meteor shower and is in need of repairs. Go out there and make sure all is back in working order.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Repair_Description_1
member.summary: We lost contact with our equipment recently. Check and repair any damage you can find and you will be well endorsed.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Repair_Description_2
member.summary: Scavengers have been targeting our equipment lately. Check our equipment for damage and return it to top condition.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Administration_SelectionText_Repair
member.summary: Select the grid that shall be rapaired in this contract

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Repair_Description_3
member.summary: A navigation error resulted into a cargo ship colliding with our equipment. Check for damage and repair any that you can find. You will be compensated for the components.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Repair_Description_4
member.summary: We would like to recommission some of our equipment but it is in no functional condition right now. Check out what is missing or damaged, fix it and you will be paid for the components.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Repair_Description_5
member.summary: Our Equipment needs inspection. Find it, perform a full checkup and repair any damage you can find.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.SafeZone_Color_TTP
member.summary: Changes color of the safe zone sphere.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_Weather_Lightning_Tooltip
member.summary: Creates lightning where you are looking

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_Weather_Generate_Tooltip
member.summary: Forces a random weather using planet's weather system

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_Weather_Replace_Tooltip
member.summary: Replaces the current Weather with the selected weather

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Find_Description_3
member.summary: A client of ours listed a reward for the one who can retrieve a lost drop pod in time. A fast vehicle and keen eye is recommended.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ContractScreen_Find_Description_4
member.summary: A courier dropped a transport container to distract his pursuers. It did not work but we are interested in seeing it's contents returned. Locate this container and mark it for pickup.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.SafeZone_Texture_DLCReq_TTIP
member.summary: Economy DLC Required. Changes texture of safe zone.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_IgnoreSafeZonesTip
member.summary: When enabled you will be completely immune to the effects of safezone. WARNING: This affects only your characters. Grids will still be affected.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_AddReputation_ReputationPropagate_Tooltip
member.summary: Propagate reputation to friends and enemies of faction. Warning: Propagation of positive and negative reputation is not symmetric. Propagating 1000 and then -1000 won't have zero sum for friends and foes of the faction.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.TerminalSafeZoneNeedsStation
member.summary: Safe zones can be enabled only on stations.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_IgnorePcuTip
member.summary: When enabled, you will completely ignore all PCU limits. This may cause you to go into negative PCUs.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Trash_KickAFKWarning
member.summary: Please note: If you remain inactive for 1 minute you will be disconnected.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Economy_CantRemoveStation_Text
member.summary: Economy stations are handled by Economy system. You may not remove them.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_Datapad
member.summary: A datapad is an electronic device used to store and display information.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_Medkit
member.summary: A medkit is a case containing medical supplies for healing astronaut.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_Package
member.summary: A package is a box used for storing items for Hauling contract.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_Powerkit
member.summary: A powerkit is a portable battery pack for recharging suit of an astronaut.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_SpaceCredit
member.summary: A Space Credit is a currency used for trading.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_AddCurrency_Player_Tooltip
member.summary: Player or faction whose currency will be modified.

member.summary: Faction whose relation will be modified.

member.summary: Player whose relation will be modified.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_VendingMachine
member.summary: Allows displaying and selling of items.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.AdminScreen_Safezone_Collision
member.summary: Safe zone collision. Reduce radius until no safezones are overlapping.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.SafeZoneBlock_Safezone_Collision
member.summary: Safe zone collision. Reduce radius or move it

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Connector_TemporaryBlock
member.summary: Connection failed. Connector will unblock in {0} seconds.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_ContractBlock
member.summary: A Contract block lets you set up your own contracts for other players to complete. You can also accept contracts from Trading stations.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_Contracts
member.summary: Contracts can be accepted trough contract blocks and are a good income of space credit. They can be found at trading stations or from other players with contract blocks.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_SafeZoneBlock
member.summary: The safe zone block projects a configurable zone to protect your base. The safe zone block requires power and zone chips to function. Zone chips can be bought from trading stations.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_SpaceCredit
member.summary: Space Credit is the universal currency used to trade with stations and other players. You can withdraw or deposit space credits from store blocks.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_StoreBlock
member.summary: You can use a store block to trade with players or other factions. Trading can be done from ship inventories when using connectors with trade functions enabled.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_TradeStations
member.summary: Trade stations can spawn on planets, moons in orbit or in deep space. Depending on what faction owns the trade station it can sell Ores, components, amunitions, fuel and ships and let you do contracts for them.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_Trading
member.summary: You can trade with players and stations using Store blocks. Trading with players can be done directly by pressing F3.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.SkinNotOwned
member.summary: You don't own selected skin. Do you want to visit DLC store?

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.HintGamepadOnly01Text
member.summary: Did you know? {0} and {1} are modifier keys. Try holding them while performing any action in-game. And most of the times the action will do something slightly different.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.HintGamepadOnly02Text
member.summary: Did you know? If you make mistake while placing blocks in survival mode you can press {0} to switch to Grinder tool. When you have Grinder equipped you can press {0} to switch to the last equipped block.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.HintGamepadOnly03Text
member.summary: Did you know? You can move through complicated windows more easily with {0}.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.HintGamepadOnly04Text
member.summary: Did you know? Hold {0}+{1} and move {2} and {3} to move camera around your character or ship.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.HintGamepadOnly07Text
member.summary: Did you know? If you are building a symmetrical ship, you can activate Symmetry Building Mode through System Radial Menu.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.HintGamepadOnly09Text
member.summary: Did you know? You can trigger Emotes Toolbar by holding {0}+{1}.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.HintGamepadOnly10Text
member.summary: Did you know? You can modify voxels with Voxel Hand Tool, which can be accesed from System Radial Menu in Creative Mode. You can then place, remove, revert and paint voxels with {GAMEPAD_CONTROL:VOXEL:PRIMARY_TOOL_ACTION}, {GAMEPAD_CONTROL:VOXEL:SECONDARY_TOOL_ACTION}, {GAMEPAD_CONTROL:VOXEL:VOXEL_REVERT} and {GAMEPAD_CONTROL:VOXEL:VOXEL_PAINT} respectively.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.HintGamepadOnly11Text
member.summary: Did you know? You can toggle off the block auto rotation function with {0}

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.HintGamepadOnly12Text
member.summary: Did you know? You can steer vehicles from a turret if the cockpit is set to main cockpit. Hold {0} to control turning around.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.HintGamepadOnly13Text
member.summary: Did you know? You can dig tunnels quickly without producing ore by using {0} with your drill.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.HintGamepadOnly00Text
member.summary: Did you know? While holding a blueprint in creative mode, you can use {0} to align them to a planet's Gravity.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.HintGamepadOnly08Text
member.summary: Did you know? Holding {0}, {1} or {0}-{1} enables you to move stacks of items by 10, 100 and 1000 at the time.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.HintGamepadOnly05Text
member.summary: Did you know? You can zoom in and out while using a camera or turret with {0}.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.HintGamepadOnly06Text
member.summary: Did you know? You can change the way GPS coordinates and Antennas are displayed on your HUD through System Radial Menu.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.RadialMenu_Label_VoxelHand_Survival
member.summary: Available only in Creative mode or with creative tools.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.RadialMenu_Label_CreativeOnly
member.summary: Available only in creative mode or with creative tools.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenSteamAndModIoConsent_ConsentTextPart1
member.summary: We use Steam and mod.io to support user-generated content in-game. To continue you must agree to the Steam and mod.io Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. A mod.io account will be created for you to browse, share and interact with user-generated content using your:

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenModIoConsent_ConsentTextPart3
member.summary: You agree that your display name, avatar and content will be shared through the mod.io API and website which may be publicly accessible. You can manage your mod.io account and opt out any time via mod.io.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenModIoConsent_LabelReadTOU
member.summary: Please read Terms of Use and accept them.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_ControlSeat
member.summary: The control seat is a cockpit block for small and large grids that allows you to control grids. It is highly comfortable but does not supply oxygen.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_BlockGroup_DeadBodies
member.summary: The remains of unfortunate engineers. They can contain loot for others to find.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_DeadEngineer
member.summary: The remains of an unfortunate engineer.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_Gate
member.summary: Gates are large reinforced doors for hallways, entrances, or small hangars. Gates are also air-tight and capable of keeping atmosphere inside.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_SciFiWall
member.summary: Sci-Fi Walls have 6 different sides that can be used to improve your interior design.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.DisplayName_BlockGroup_LCDGroupSOTF
member.summary: Very Large LCD Panels from the Sparks Of the Future pack.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_NeonTubes
member.summary: Neon Tubes are decorative blocks that can be built in all colors.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_FrostbitePack
member.summary: The Frostbite Pack includes a new scenario and four new blocks: Antenna Dish, Dead Engineers, Gate and the Offset Door. Additionally, this DLC features the Frozen Armor Skin and LCD Posters.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_AntennaDish
member.summary: Antennas can be used to broadcast positions, messages HUD markers and allows grids to be accessed or controlled from a distance. Antennas need to be able to send and receive, so make sure two antennas always overlap each other's position.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_OffsetDoor
member.summary: Doors can seal off interiors and make them air tight while still allowing access for the player.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.MessageBoxWorldOperation_Quota
member.summary: There is not enough space for the operation. Please, remove some saved games or blueprints and try again.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.MessageBoxWorldOperation_CloudSynchronization
member.summary: Cloud synchronization failed. Please, enable cloud synchronization and try again later.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.MessageBoxWorldOperation_Error
member.summary: The operation failed. Please, try again later.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.MessageBoxWorldSave_Quota
member.summary: There is not enough space to save the game! Please, remove some saved games or blueprints and try again.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_Hinge
member.summary: Hinges can transfer items and rotate up to 180 degrees.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_HingeHead
member.summary: Hinge Parts can be reattached to hinges.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.TerminalTab_GPS_CopyToClipboard_GamepadHelp
member.summary: Open chat and use {CONTROL:GUI:RIGHT_STICK_BUTTON} to paste GPS

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ToolTipOptionsGame_AreaInteraction
member.summary: Area interaction enables you to interact with objects that are close to the crosshair without looking at them directly.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.BlueprintScreen_FilePathTooLong_Description
member.summary: File path is too long, current length is {0}, maximum length is {1}. Path: {2}

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_BarCounter
member.summary: With a decorative bar counter block you can create a place to serve drinks and share stories of heroism and tragedy.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_TextBlocks
member.summary: Letters, numbers and symbol blocks allow you to build text and indications onto your ships and structures.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_SOTFPack
member.summary: The Sparks Of The Future Pack comes with several new blocks like Neon Tubes, a small grid door and a unique button panels. It also comes with several new character animations and armor skins.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_Weather
member.summary: There are unique weather systems on every planet that can affect sunlight, wind, oxygen and temperature. Lightning can be dangerous and damage your structures but prioritizes some blocks. Weather can be disabled in world settings.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_RevertBoulderTooltip
member.summary: For Boulder reverting, minimum player distance is: {0} m.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_ExhaustPipe
member.summary: The Exhaust Pipe emits particles like smoke and fire to decorate vehicles and structures.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_BuggyCockpit
member.summary: The Buggy Cockpit is similar to the rover cockpit but with a roll cage to keep you safe. Please keep hands and feet inside.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_RoverCockpit
member.summary: The Rover Cockpit is a compact cockpit designed for rovers but works just as well for small ships or large small grid interiors.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_OffsetLight
member.summary: The Offset Light and Offset Spotlight function the same as regular lights and can be used to illuminate dark areas.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_BarredWindow
member.summary: Barred windows have the same integrity as glass windows but are not air tight. Great for keeping big spiders outside.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_StorageShelf
member.summary: Storage Shelves can be used to store components and make your hangar or garage look messy and productive.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_ScrapRacePack
member.summary: The Wasteland Pack includes a new multiplayer scenario and several new blocks like the Off Road wheels, Car lights, Buggy cockpit, Viewport Blocks and the Exhaust Pipe. Additionally, this DLC features several new armour and player skins like the Heavy Rust Armor Skin, Concrete Armor skin and the Scavenger character skin.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_ViewPort
member.summary: Viewports are available in the Wasteland Pack. They are windows that fit flush with armour blocks and combine easily with desks and kitchens.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_WeaponRack
member.summary: The Weapon Rack stores weapons and ammunition for quick access.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.PublishBlueprint_Question
member.summary: Do you want to publish this blueprint?

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.WorldFileCouldNotBeEdited
member.summary: Changing campaign settings may cause serious problems. It is allowed only in experimental mode.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.TerminalTab_Factions_LeaveToolTip_Balancing
member.summary: You cannot leave factions when autobalancing is enabled

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_SemiAutoPistol
member.summary: The S-10 standard issue sidearm. Built for use in a hostile environment: Simple, reliable, dependable.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FireCover
member.summary: Fire Covers provide cover in interiors or can be used to prevent players from walking off ledges.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_Embrasure
member.summary: The Embrasure provides cover while allowing you to keep up the pressure on your enemies.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_TargetDummy
member.summary: The Target Dummy block allows you to hone your skills with handheld weaponry or test their mechanics. You can set them up to perform actions when hit or destroyed. The Target Dummy requires steel plates to repair itself.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.BlockPropertyDescription_EnableRegeneration
member.summary: Enable dummy to be regenerated after its complete destruction.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.BlockPropertyDescription_RegenerationDelay
member.summary: Time before the dummy is restored

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_BasicHandHeldLauncher
member.summary: Shoulder fired rocket ordinance. Launches a rocket propelled anti-vehicle projectile.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_AdvancedHandHeldLauncher
member.summary: Building on the reliable design of the RO-1 the PRO-1 provides a number of battlefield improvements, including a precision scope.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_ElitePistol
member.summary: An S-10 variant, the E model sidearm features a modified “feather” trigger and boasts a red dot sight.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FullAutoPistol
member.summary: A true “next-generation” sidearm. Featuring heat resistant components, a full-auto trigger group, and extended ammo capacity. The S-20A is purpose-built to take it to the next level.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_Match_Advance_Tooltip
member.summary: Advance match to next available state

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_Match_Start_Tooltip
member.summary: Restart match to the initial state of PreMatch

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_Match_Stop_Tooltip
member.summary: End the match by advancing to Finished state

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_Match_AddTime_Tooltip
member.summary: Add remaining time to a current match state (can be both positive or negative)

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.ScreenDebugAdminMenu_Match_SetTime_Tooltip
member.summary: Set remaining time of current match state (must be non-negative)

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_BlueprintClass_Consumables
member.summary: Consumables - Click on any item to assemble it.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_EliteAutomaticRifle
member.summary: The MR-30E is a modernized and battle-ready version of the well known model 20. The model 30E features 3-round burst-fire, an extended magazine, and a red dot sight.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_PreciseAutomaticRifle
member.summary: The MR-8P is designed for long range engagements. The model 8P makes use of a much heavier barrel to achieve unmatched accuracy and stopping power.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_RapidFireAutomaticRifle
member.summary: The MR-50A enjoys notoriety as the smallest squad support machine gun in modern use. The model 50A can unleash a withering stream of suppressive fire, at a rate of 550 RPM.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.UGC_ServiceNotAvailable_NoConsent
member.summary: : not available. User consent not granted. Go to Options / Game.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_CombatMechanics
member.summary: Various hand-held weapons allow you to defend yourself; ranging from basic pistols useful as a sidearm to advanced rifles for special operations, and even anti-armor launchers. These weapons need to be loaded with the correct magazine. Standing still, crouching and aiming the weapon will increase accuracy and reduce recoil.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_HandHeldLaunchers
member.summary: Hand-held launchers provide effective anti-armor capability in a small package. The hand-held launchers need to be loaded with the same rocket munition as their block counterparts.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_Pistols
member.summary: Sidearms can be used to defend yourself in a hostile environment. They need to be loaded with the corresponding magazines.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_Rifles
member.summary: Rifles are a step up from the basic pistol and other sidearms, do more damage to blocks, and fit specialized roles. They need to be loaded with the corresponding magazines.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_FAQ_Warfare1
member.summary: Warfare 1: Field Engineer features a variety of new blocks like the Half Window, Embrasure, Weapon Rack, and Fire Cover, as well as a new skin and emotes.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.NotificationGridIsImmune
member.summary: This grid is immune to damage

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Tooltip_OverridePowerTransfer
member.summary: Allow power transfer while current grid is powered off

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_BeamBlock
member.summary: Beam blocks offer a variety of different shapes to be used as decoration or light structural support.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.BlockPropertyTooltip_LargeTurretTargetLocking
member.summary: While this is enabled, you can select and lock targets while controlling this block

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.BlockActionTooltip_LargeTurretUnlockTarget
member.summary: This immediately forgets the current target

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.BlockPropertyTooltip_LargeTurretFireAtLockedTarget
member.summary: Enabling this will make the turrets aim and fire at a locked target

member.summary: Make turret lock to your target.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_Autocannon
member.summary: Medium rate of fire, with a good punch. Uses Autocannon Magazines. Maximum range: 800 m

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.BlockPropertyDescription_MultiplierAzimuth
member.summary: Modify maximum velocity of azimuth rotor

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.BlockPropertyDescription_MultiplierElevation
member.summary: Modify maximum velocity of elevation rotor

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_Searchlight
member.summary: Searchlights are articulated spotlights that can target nearby grids and can be used as cameras.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_HeatVent
member.summary: Heat Vents open and emit light when the ships power usage increases.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_LargeCalibreTurret
member.summary: A titanic turret perfectly suited for battles against heavily armored targets. Uses Artillery Shells. Maximum range: 2000 m

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_MediumCalibreTurret
member.summary: Slower and bigger sibling of the Autocannon. Deals decent damage to armored targets. Uses Assault Cannon Shells. Maximum range: 1400 m

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.BlockPropertyDescription_AngleDeviation
member.summary: Turret will shoot only if the angle to target is less than deviation.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_Railgun
member.summary: High range, maximum penetration, very low rate of fire. Needs to charge up before each shot. Uses Large Railgun Sabots. Maximum range: 2000 m

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.TurretControlBlock_Detail_Status_Error1
member.summary: ERROR: Missing elevation or azimuth rotor/hinge

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.TurretControlBlock_Detail_Status_Error2
member.summary: ERROR: Must have a linked weapon, tool or camera

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.TurretControlBlock_Detail_Status_Warn
member.summary: WARNING: No clue about multiple weapons yet

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_BlastDoor
member.summary: Blast Doors are used to create custom doors in conjunction with mechanical blocks like pistons, rotors, or hinges.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_TurretControlBlock
member.summary: The Custom Turret Controller is capable of providing AI behavior to custom built rotor and hinge-based turrets. It can also be used to manually control the turret. A custom turret requires at least one rotor/hinge and one weapon/tool or camera to be functional.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_HeavyCalibreGun
member.summary: A titanic gun perfectly suited for battles against heavily armored targets. Uses Artillery Shells. Maximum range: 2000 m

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_MediumCalibreGun
member.summary: Slower and bigger sibling of the Autocannon. Deals decent damage to armored targets. Uses Assault Cannon Shells. Maximum range: 1400 m

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_CockpitStandingBridge
member.summary: Helms are control stations that are operated in standing position.

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_AutoCannonTurret
member.summary: Medium rate of fire, with a good punch in a small turret. Uses Autocannon Magazines. Maximum range: 800 m

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_SmallRailgun
member.summary: High range, maximum penetration, very low rate of fire. Needs to charge up before each shot. Uses Small Railgun Sabots. Maximum range: 1400 m

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_LargeRocketLauncher
member.summary: A bigger version of the rocket launcher, capable of using the conveyor system to automatically reload. Uses Missiles. Maximum range: 800 m

member.name: F:Sandbox.Game.Localization.MySpaceTexts.Description_EngineerPlushie
member.summary: An advanced motivational device of pristine quality. Can not be crafted or disassembled.

member.name: T:Sandbox.Game.MyGridExplosion
member.summary: This class is responsible for calculating damage from explosions It works by recursively raycasting from the point it needs to calculate to the explosion center. It does two types of raycast, 3D DDA raycasts for traversing grids (ships, stations) and Havok raycasts for traversing space between grids. For each block, it builds a stack of blocks that are between it and the explosion center and then calculates the damage for all blocks in this stack. It early exits if it encounters a block that was already calculated.

member.summary: Computes damage for all blocks assigned in constructor

member.param: World position from where the cast starts (usually the entity position)

member.summary: Performs a grid raycast (is prone to aliasing effects). It can be recursive (it calls CastPhysicsRay when exiting the grid or when it hits an empty cell).
member.returns: Returns starting damage for current stack

member.name: T:Sandbox.Game.WorldEnvironment.__helper_namespace.Node
member.summary: We want the node type outside the My2DClipmap class because that class is generic. Still we don't want it to be visible elsewhere.

members.member:
What is this?
Partial implementation of a 2D Clipmap.
Beware that my implementation uses a quadtree for 1:2 lod size ratios. This makes the implementation simpler but does differ from the implementations in literature.
Additionally literature proposes that there be a invalid zone where data is preloaded. In our case that zone is of size 0.
Other than that we have what I jugde some pretty efficient and compact code, the results seem quite agreeable.

Information about a item.
Total Size: 32 bytes;
Get the item that corresponds to a given shape key.

member.name: M:Sandbox.MyInitializer.UnhandledExceptionHandler(System.Object,System.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs)
member.summary: This handler gets called when unhandled exception occurs in main thread or any other background thread. We display our own error message and prevent displaying windows standard crash message because I have discovered that if error occurs during XNA loading, no message box is displayed ever. Game just turns off. So this is a solution, user sees the same error message every time. But I have discovered that it's sometimes not called when CLR throws OutOfMemoryException. But sometimes it is!!! I assume there are other fatal exception types that won't be handled here: stack-something or engine-fatal-i-dont-know... Possible explanation of this mystery: OutOfMemoryException is so fatal that CRL just shut-downs the application so we can't write to log or display messagebox.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.
